item.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Leaks: Upcoming Flagship Smartphone Might Lack Telephoto Camera & Feature Rounded Corners - ABP Live
item.description:
Samsung Galaxy S25 Leaks: Upcoming Flagship Smartphone Might Lack Telephoto Camera & Feature Rounded Corners

Published on: 15 Dec 2024 at 08:06 PM (IST) Source: ABP Live

The upcoming Galaxy S25 Ultra is anticipated to depart from previous models in terms of design, potentially lacking a periscope telephoto camera while introducing rounded corners.

  • The Galaxy S25 Ultra may feature a flatter frame and softer corners.
  • Leaked dummy units do not include a periscope telephoto lens, a common feature in previous Ultra models.
  • Samsung might introduce ALoP (All Lenses on Prism) technology, which has a 3x optical zoom.
  • Rumored camera upgrades include a 50MP ultrawide sensor to enhance photography capabilities.
  • Official unveiling is expected at a Samsung Unpacked event rumored for January 2025.
"Samsung’s Ultra series has consistently set a high standard for flagship smartphones, and the Galaxy S25 Ultra appears ready to uphold that tradition—possibly with some unexpected innovations."

With the potential design and camera updates, the Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra aims to maintain the legacy of its Ultra predecessors while possibly integrating new technologies.

item.title: We just got a hint that we might have to pay more for the iPhone 17 - TechRadar
item.description:
We just got a hint that we might have to pay more for the iPhone 17

Publication Date: October 2023

Source: TechRadar

  • iPhone 17 price increases are expected
  • As yet we haven't seen many price leaks
  • A new model is expected to appear in 2025

As anticipation builds for the upcoming iPhone 17, industry analysts suggest potential price increases compared to the previous model, the iPhone 16.

  • Analyst Jong Wook Lee from Samsung Securities predicts increased prices for the iPhone 17 after stability in pricing for the iPhone 16.
  • The current starting price for the iPhone 16 is $799, with some models like the iPhone 16 Pro Max reaching $1,199.
  • There are rumors about a new model, the iPhone 17 Air, which could be priced at $1,299.

“iPhone prices are expected to increase next year after no price increase in 2024.” - Jong Wook Lee, Samsung Securities Research Center

While precise pricing for the iPhone 17 remains uncertain, market trends suggest Apple may capitalize on higher price points to enhance profit margins.

item.title: iPhone 17 to bringer newer design, different camera module and slimmer variants in 2025: What to expect? - India TV News
item.description:
iPhone 17 to bringer newer design, different camera module and slimmer variants in 2025: What to expect?

Publication Date: December 15, 2024

Source: India TV News

Apple's iPhone 17 series is generating excitement with rumors of a new design, enhanced hardware features, and a slim variant expected to launch around September 2025. Significant AI updates and a redesigned camera system are also anticipated.

  • Horizontal Camera Module: The iPhone 17 may feature a horizontal camera strip, moving away from the traditional square module.
  • New Slim Variant: A Slim version is rumored, aligning with a new frame design and centered ultra-wide-angle lens.
  • Pro Model Updates: Changes to the Dynamic Island and potential material shifts from titanium to aluminum in Pro models.
  • Lineup Changes: The possibility of discontinuing the Plus model in favor of a new Slim or Air variant.
“The iPhone 17 series is shaping up to be a significant departure from its predecessors.”

The upcoming iPhone 17 series could redefine Apple's flagship offerings with its innovative features and design changes, targeting a broader audience with its new lineup.

item.title: OpenAI unveils Video Interaction features for ChatGPT users - India TV News
item.description:
OpenAI unveils Video Interaction features for ChatGPT users

Publication Date: December 15, 2024

Source: India TV News

OpenAI continues to enhance ChatGPT’s capabilities by introducing new video interaction features that allow users to engage with the AI in real-time through video recognition and analysis.

  • The AI now has video processing capabilities, enabling it to recognize objects and provide instant insights via smartphone cameras.
  • Rolling out in December for ChatGPT Plus and Pro subscribers, with enterprise and educational access expected by January 2025.
  • OpenAI announced Sora Turbo, a tool to create ultra-realistic videos from text prompts, available to ChatGPT Plus and Pro users.
  • Users can create videos up to 20 seconds long in various formats with customization options for precise editing.
  • Sora Turbo is currently restricted in the UK, EU, and Switzerland due to regulations and has age limits for access.
“OpenAI plans to introduce flexible pricing models in 2025, further democratizing access to its advanced AI technologies.”

This latest update marks a significant expansion of ChatGPT’s features, aiming to enhance user interaction and video content creation capabilities.

item.title: Apple’s Siri gets smarter, iPhone 16 gets exclusive AI features in iOS 18.2 - India TV News
item.description:
Apple’s Siri gets smarter, iPhone 16 gets exclusive AI features in iOS 18.2

Publication Date: December 15, 2024

Source: India TV News

Apple has launched the iOS 18.2 update, introducing a range of advanced AI features and tools aimed at enhancing user experience, particularly for iPhone 16 users.

  • Image Playground: A new app that allows users to create animated and illustrated images using generative AI.
  • Image Wand: Converts sketches and notes into refined images to enhance productivity.
  • Writing Tools Expansion: New features to improve text editing and formatting.
  • Visual Intelligence: Exclusive to iPhone 16, providing real-time object information and text translation.
  • ChatGPT Integration: Siri is now smarter, capable of answering complex queries and analyzing documents.
Siri can now answer complex queries, explain documents, and analyze photos, taking personal assistance to the next level.

The iOS 18.2 update enhances Apple's commitment to integrating cutting-edge AI features, particularly for its latest iPhone models.

item.title: iPhone 17 Air launch confirmed? Likely to replace iPhone 17 Plus - India Today
item.description:
iPhone 17 Air launch confirmed? Likely to replace iPhone 17 Plus

Publication Date: November 2024 | Source: India Today

The upcoming iPhone 17 Air is confirmed for launch in 2025, intended to replace the iPhone 17 Plus in Apple's smartphone lineup.

  • The iPhone 17 Air has entered the New Product Introduction (NPI) phase at Foxconn.
  • This phase includes design validation, prototype testing, and pilot production.
  • Rumored to be approximately 2mm slimmer than the iPhone 16 Pro.
  • Display size is expected to be between 6.55 and 6.65 inches.
  • Will be equipped with a custom-designed 5G modem chip for optimized performance.
  • A new rear camera design is anticipated, featuring a single 48MP lens.
  • The iPhone 17 Air is set to debut alongside other models with significant design changes.
"The iPhone 17 Air's display size is rumored to be between 6.55 and 6.65 inches."

The iPhone 17 Air promises to bring several advancements and a new design, positioning itself as a robust option in Apple's upcoming smartphone lineup.

item.title: How to plan the perfect serve for a house party | Mint - Mint
item.description:
How to plan the perfect serve for a house party | Mint

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: Mint

This article discusses the concept of the "perfect serve" in bartending, highlighting essential techniques and tips to elevate cocktail experiences at home.

  • The perfect serve involves ingredients, temperature, glassware, ice, technique, ambience, and service.
  • The classic Old Fashioned is highlighted, with specifics on serving temperature, glass type, and ice use.
  • Neil Alexander emphasizes the role of garnishes, particularly the importance of fresh orange peel for flavor enhancement.
  • Key techniques for cocktails include shaking versus stirring and maintaining flavor balance.
“Knowing that you should shake, not stir cocktails which have juices or creams in them and vice versa for the spirit-forward drinks; pouring gently over the back of a spoon to maintain distinct layers; balancing flavours are all crucial to a great cocktail experience." - Neil Alexander

In conclusion, the article provides practical advice for recreating a professional cocktail experience at home, focusing on the importance of technique and attention to detail.

item.title: 5 things the Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra could do to beat the iPhone 16 Pro Max - TechRadar
item.description:
5 things the Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra could do to beat the iPhone 16 Pro Max

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: TechRadar

The Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra, set for release soon, is expected to compete against the iPhone 16 Pro Max. To enhance its chances, there are several key improvements that Samsung could implement.

  • Up the zoom to 10x: Reintroducing the 10x optical zoom that was removed from the Galaxy S24 Ultra could give Samsung an edge in camera capabilities.
  • Improve the ultra-wide camera: A new 50MP ultra-wide sensor could match the iPhone 16 Pro Max's specifications.
  • Boost the battery life: Enhancements in battery performance, ideally exceeding the 16-hour life of current models, would be beneficial.
  • Lower the price: Bringing the price closer to that of the iPhone 16 Pro Max, currently starting at $1,199, could attract more buyers.
  • Polish the software: Improving the user interface of One UI to be more intuitive like iOS would enhance user experience and competitiveness.
"Samsung's phone could have Apple’s beat here." – TechRadar

In conclusion, the success of the Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra will heavily depend on its ability to innovate and match or exceed the current features of the iPhone 16 Pro Max. If Samsung can address these key areas, it could significantly enhance its market position.

item.title: ‘Younger investors are driving interest in alternative asset classes’ | Stock Market News - Mint
item.description:
```html

Younger investors are driving interest in alternative asset classes

Publication Date: [Insert Date Here] Source: Stock Market News

As younger investors increasingly take on active roles in wealth management, there is a noteworthy shift towards alternative asset classes like private equity and private credit.

  • Younger investors are establishing family offices for professional wealth management.
  • Interest in diversification and higher returns is increasing among younger investors.
  • Equity now accounts for up to two-thirds of investment portfolios.
  • There is a growing appetite for alternative investment funds (AIFs) and private equity.
"Additionally, there is a growing interest in alternative asset classes, including private equity and private credit, as younger investors prioritise diversification and seek higher returns." - Umang Papneja, CEO of Julius Baer India.

This trend indicates a significant shift in investment strategies among younger generations, highlighting their focus on diversification and increased returns.

```

item.title: Realme 14x 5G to launch with 6000mAh battery, under Rs 15000: Launching on December 18 - India TV News
item.description:
Realme 14x 5G to launch with 6000mAh battery, under Rs 15000: Launching on December 18

Publication Date: December 15, 2024 Source: India TV News

Realme is set to launch its latest mid-range smartphone, the Realme 14x 5G, in India on December 18. This smartphone will feature a massive 6000mAh battery and IP69 rating, aimed at the budget segment.

  • The device will be available in three RAM variants, including an 8GB RAM and 256GB storage model.
  • It boasts a 6.67-inch HD+ IPS LCD display, ideal for streaming and gaming.
  • The 14x 5G features advanced water and dust resistance with its IP69 rating, making it suitable for tough conditions.
  • Equipped with a fingerprint scanner integrated into the power button for added security.
  • Expected to launch under Rs 15,000, potentially becoming the world’s cheapest IP69-rated smartphone.
  • Available for purchase on Realme’s official website and Flipkart.
"The device might be titled the world’s cheapest IP69-rated smartphone."

In conclusion, the Realme 14x 5G aims to provide exceptional features and durability at an affordable price point, making it an attractive option for budget-conscious consumers.

item.title: NYT Strands Answers For December 15: Today’s Spangram Could Be Hard To Find. Here Are The Solutions - ABP Live
item.description:
NYT Strands Answers For December 15: Today’s Spangram Could Be Hard To Find. Here Are The Solutions.

Publication Date: December 15, 2024

Source: ABP Live Gaming

Tired of Wordle? The New York Times has launched Strands, a new word puzzle that challenges vocabulary skills by requiring players to find six to eight words hidden in a scrambled letter grid centered around a theme.

  • Strands is a daily puzzle available on the NYT Games section.
  • Players identify words based on a themed grid of 54 letters.
  • The game includes a hidden theme called Spangram, revealed after finding six words.
  • Today's theme is "Moonlighting" with answers including BUNNY, BELL, STAR, and others.
“The word spans the entirety of the grid. Add ‘span’ to ‘anagram’, and et voilà! You get Spangram.”

Stay tuned to ABP Live Gaming for more guides and stories about NYT Strands and other games.

item.title: Up to 50 480p videos per month! All about Sora video generator - ET Now
item.description:
Up to 50 480p videos per month! All about Sora video generator

Publication Date: Dec 15, 2024

Source: etnownews.com

OpenAI has introduced its new AI video generator, Sora, which allows users to create videos efficiently. This article covers the features and usage of Sora.

  • Sora can generate up to 50 480p videos or fewer 720p videos monthly at no extra cost for Plus account users.
  • Premium ChatGPT users can create videos instantly based on prompts.
  • Users can produce films with a resolution of up to 1080p and various aspect ratios.
  • The Pro plan offers significantly more usage with better resolution and longer durations.
  • Content generated will contain C2PA metadata for transparency and origin verification.
  • A limited number of testers are working with Sora to address concerns over misuse, such as deepfakes.
"OpenAI is blocking content with nudity to prevent harmful uses, including child sexual abuse material and sexual deepfakes."

Sora represents an advancement in AI video generation, promoting creativity while prioritizing user safety and ethical use.

item.description:
iPhone 17 To iPhone 17 Pro Max: Launch Date, Price In India, Design, Cameras, Specs, Leaks, Everything We Know

Publication Date: [Insert date here]

Source: [Insert source here]

The iPhone 17 series is poised for a major update, expected to include several models with significant design and performance improvements ahead of its 2025 launch.

  • The lineup includes iPhone 17, iPhone 17 Air, iPhone 17 Pro, and iPhone 17 Pro Max.
  • iPhone 17 Air may become the thinnest iPhone ever at 5-6mm.
  • All models will feature 120Hz ProMotion displays and the new A19 chip for enhanced performance.
  • Camera upgrades include three 48MP cameras in iPhone 17 Pro Max and a single 48MP in iPhone 17 Air.
  • Launch expected in September 2025, with prices starting around Rs 80,000 for standard models and Rs 1,20,000 for Pro models.
"The iPhone 17 Pro Max is tipped to house three 48MP cameras, making it a photography powerhouse."

The iPhone 17 series is shaping up to be one of Apple's most anticipated releases, with innovations in design and technology that promise to enhance user experience significantly.

item.title: Today's NYT Strands Hints, Answers and Help for Dec. 15, #287 - CNET
item.description:
Today's NYT Strands Hints, Answer and Help for Dec. 15, #287 - CNET

Publication Date: December 15, 2024 | Source: CNET

The article provides hints and answers for the New York Times Strands puzzle themed around "Moonlighting," along with related insights for stargazers.

  • Today's Strands theme is "Moonlighting".
  • Clue: Made of green cheese.
  • Goal: Find hidden words related to the theme.
  • Words used for hints: GLUE, BEST, WANING, and others.
  • Non-spangram answers include FULL, WANING, WAXING, and more.

"2024 has been a great year for stargazing for me." - CNET Article

Stargazing enthusiasts are encouraged to engage with today's Strands puzzle and explore the hints provided for an enhanced gaming experience.

item.title: Garena Free Fire MAX redeem codes for December 15, 2024: Win today's free diamonds, weapon, skins, characters - Indiatimes.com
item.description:
Garena Free Fire MAX redeem codes for December 15, 2024: Win today's free diamonds, weapon, skins, characters

Publication Date: December 15, 2024

Source: Indiatimes

Garena Free Fire MAX has gained massive popularity in India, especially after the ban of its predecessor, offering players exciting rewards through redeem codes that enhance gameplay.

  • Today's redeem codes provide players with free diamonds, weapon skins, and special character bundles.
  • Active redeem codes include:
    • FFMAX0123ABCD – Claim a weapon skin.
    • CHARMEXMAS – Redeem a pet's skin.
    • MAXGG2024 – Get a special character bundle.
    • XMAS2024FF – Redeem a Christmas-themed item.
  • These codes are valid for a limited time, typically 12 to 18 hours, so players should act quickly.
  • Daily codes are released to the first 500 players to ensure fair play.
"Dive into Garena Free Fire MAX and use these redeem codes to enhance your gaming experience."

Players must link their accounts to eligible platforms to successfully redeem codes and claim rewards from the in-game mail section. Enjoy the thrill of rewards while playing Garena Free Fire MAX!
